      • Answer

        public Answer(int id,
              java.lang.String text,
              Quiz quiz,
              Question question,
              Student student)

        Creates an answer object

        Creates an answer object with the id, text, quiz, question, student attributes

        Parameters:
        id - id of the answer
        text - content of the answer
        quiz - The quiz that is associated with the answer
        question - The question that is associated with the answer
        student - The student associated with the answer
